meanings.definition: The branch of physics dealing with phenomena on a very small scale.
meanings.sent1: Studying microphysics helps us understand tiny particles.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use microphysics to explore the world of atoms.
meanings.sent3: The professor joked that microphysics is like solving puzzles under a microscope.
meanings.sent4: In the world of microphysics, atoms dance like tiny stars in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The intricacies of microphysics are as fascinating as a miniature universe.

meanings.definition: The study of physical processes at the atomic and subatomic level.
meanings.sent1: Microphysics reveals the secrets of the tiniest building blocks of matter.
meanings.sent2: Researchers delve into microphysics to uncover the mysteries of particles.
meanings.sent3: Exploring microphysics feels like embarking on a journey through a microscopic world.
meanings.sent4: The realm of microphysics is a realm of endless discovery at the smallest scales.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of microphysics lies in its ability to unveil the hidden workings of the universe.
